name: Hydro Flask Day Escape Soft Cooler Tote
description: For summer picnics or weekend getaways, this fully insulated tote keeps perishables fresh and beverages chilly. The lined interior wipes down in case of leaks.Burly 600-denier polyester shell with welded seams.Lightweight insulation keeps food cold for up to 36 hours.Watertight zipper for leak-proof transport.Removable shoulder strap and 2 soft handles provide carry options.Multiple gear loops for attaching accessories.26L version has an external stretch pocket for snacks or utensils.
